context._comment: check_enabled: set false to skip context prompts before critical operations

vertex_ai._comment: Required for Vertex AI: set project and location. Falls back to gcloud config (project) and GOOGLE_CLOUD_LOCATION env var.

external_review._comment_alert: alert_if_missing: set false to skip external LLM checks silently
external_review._comment_iterations: feedback_iterations: number of review/integrate cycles (0 = skip external review entirely). More than 1 feedback iteration is not yet implemented

models._comment: Models used for external plan review

llm_client._comment: Timeout and retry settings for external LLM calls
